remarks: Alternate definition of well-founded relation.  Similar to Definition 6.21 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 30.  (Contributed by NM, 17-Feb-2004.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 23-Jun-2015.)
statement:
dffr2 $p |- ( R Fr A <-> A. x ( ( x C_ A /\ x =/= (/) ) -> E. y e. x { z e. x | z R y } = (/) ) ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d R x y z $.
